mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( m_email, m_pw, m_name, m_profile_img, m_nick, m_phone, m_regdate, m_logtype, m_admintype, m_is_maintain, m_retention_period, m_birth, m_gender ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{profileImg}, #{nick}, #{phone}, NOW(), 0, #{admintype}, #{isMaintain}, #{retentionPeriod}, DATE_FORMAT(#{birth}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{gender} )
mapper.select: SELECT m.m_id, m.m_email, m.m_pw, m.m_name, m.m_profile_img, m.m_nick, m.m_phone, m.m_regdate, m.m_logtype, m.m_admintype, m.m_is_maintain, m.m_retention_period, m.m_birth, m.m_gender, a.a_id, a.a_zipcode, a.a_addr1, a.a_addr2 FROM MEMBER AS m LEFT JOIN ADDRESS AS a ON m.m_id = a.m_id WHERE m.m_email = #{email} AND m.m_pw = #{pw}

SELECT m.m_id AS mId, m.m_email AS email, m.m_pw AS pw, m.m_name AS name, m.m_profile_img AS profileImg, m.m_nick AS nick, m.m_phone AS phone, m.m_regdate AS regdate, m.m_logtype AS logtype, m.m_admintype AS admintype, m.m_is_maintain AS isMaintain, m.m_retention_period AS retentionPeriod, m.m_birth AS birth, m.m_gender AS gender, a.a_id AS aId, a.m_id AS mId, a.a_zipcode AS zipcode, a.a_addr1 AS addr1, a.a_addr2 AS addr2 FROM MEMBER AS m ON m.m_id = a.m_id WHERE m.m_email = #{email}

SELECT m.m_id AS mId, m.m_email AS email, m.m_pw AS pw, m.m_name AS name, m.m_profile_img AS profileImg, m.m_nick AS nick, m.m_phone AS phone, m.m_regdate AS regdate, m.m_logtype AS logtype, m.m_admintype AS admintype, m.m_is_maintain AS isMaintain, m.m_retention_period AS retentionPeriod, m.m_birth AS birth, m.m_gender AS gender, a.a_id AS aId, a.m_id AS mId, a.a_zipcode AS zipcode, a.a_addr1 AS addr1, a.a_addr2 AS addr2 FROM MEMBER AS m LEFT JOIN ADDRESS AS a ON m.m_id = a.m_id WHERE m.m_id = #{mId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER m LEFT JOIN ADDRESS a ON m.m_id = a.m_id SET m.m_name = #{name}, m.m_nick = #{nick}, m.m_email = #{email}, m.m_phone = #{phone}, m.m_birth = #{birth}, m.m_gender = #{gender}, a.a_zipcode = #{addressVO.zipcode}, a.a_addr1 = #{addressVO.addr1}, a.a_addr2 = #{addressVO.addr2} WHERE m.m_id = #{mId}
